message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $120. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope you find it appealing.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I would like to extend a special deal to you. For a limited time, I am willing to consider $140 for the product. This is my final offer, as it still reflects the value of our product while being more accessible to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm glad you're considering our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I've decided to offer you the product at $125. This price reflects the value of the product and is a fair compromise. I hope you'll find this offer acceptable.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $125 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your position, Bob. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to offer the product at $120. This price reflects both the value of the product and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope you will find this offer satisfactory.
